quotes.quote: March is the month God created to show people who don't drink what a hangover is like.
It is the month of June, The month of leaves and roses, When pleasant sights salute the eyes And pleasant scents the noses.
February is the uncertain month, neither black nor white but all shades between by turns. Nothing is sure.
Months are different in college, especially freshman year. Too much happens. Every freshman month equals six regular months, they're like dog months.
What of October, that ambiguous month, the month of tension, the unendurable month?
Four months is a lot of living with that little life in you-thinking about it, eating right for it, nurturing it and all of a sudden, it dies.
Tis a month before the month of May, And the spring comes slowly up this way.
August is a month when if it is hot weather it is really very hot.
You ought to know that October is the first Spring month.
November is the most disagreeable month in the whole year.
October was always the least dependable of months, full of ghosts and shadows.
You never realize how short a month is until you have to pay alimony.
Once a month, try something you don't think you'd be good at. You can find such happy surprises.
December is the toughest month of the year. Others are July, January, September, April, November, May, March, June, October, August, and February.
If months were marked by colors, November in New England would be colored gray.
All the months are crude experiments.
April, the angel of the months, the young love of the year.
Six months go by very quickly when you're a genius.
A month of days, a year of months, 20 years of months in the treadmill, is the life that slays everything worthy of the name of life.
If January is the month of change, February is the month of lasting change. January is for dreamers, February is for doers.
A couple of months in the laboratory can frequently save a couple of hours in the library.
Every month, it is woman's fate to face the abyss of time and being, the abyss which is herself.
April is the cruelest month, breeding lilacs out of the dead land, mixing memory and desire, stirring dull roots with spring rain.
January, month of empty pockets! let us endure this evil month, anxious as a theatrical producer's forehead.
As full of spirit as the month of May, and as gorgeous as the sun in Midsummer.
Once a month, some women act like men act all the time.
Three months is a lifetime in politics.
January is the month for dreaming.
